# Load useful packages

```{r libraries, message=FALSE}
library(scConform)
library(SingleCellExperiment)
library(VGAM)
library(foreach)
library(ontoProc)
library(MerfishData)
library(doParallel)
library(igraph)
library(scuttle)

`%notin%` = Negate(`%in%`)

num_cores <- 2
cl1 <- makeCluster(num_cores)
registerDoParallel(cl1)
```
